persona.name: Lucas Davis

occupation.title: Unemployed
occupation.description: Currently unemployed, having recently left a position as a junior game developer due to company downsizing. I am actively seeking new opportunities in the gaming industry while balancing family responsibilities.

long_term_goals: To create a successful video game that resonates with players worldwide.
To provide a stable and loving environment for my children.
To achieve financial stability and eventually own a home.

other_facts: You grew up in a suburban neighborhood, where you developed a love for video games at a young age. Your parents encouraged your interests, providing you with a computer to explore programming.
In college, you met your wife, Emily, and together you built a life focused on family and creativity. You often collaborate on projects, blending her artistic skills with your technical knowledge.
You have two children, ages 4 and 6, who inspire you to create games that are fun and educational. You hope to involve them in your projects as they grow older.
